property.title_l3: Квартира в Аль Суфух，Аль Суфух 1，Акейша Эвенюз，Бахия Резиденс，Бахия Резиденс 2, 1 спальня, 1150000 AED - 7589543
property.description:
Tamani Properties is delighted to present a 1 bedroom apartment for sale in Bahia 2 building, Al Safouh 1. 


Property Details & Amenities:-


- 1 Bedroom 


- Built-in Wardrobe


- Parking Space


- Floor-to-ceiling Windows


- Easy Access to Main Roads


- 24-hour Security


- CCTV monitored


- Shared Swimming Pool


- Shared Fully Equipped Gymnasium


- High-Speed Elevators




Bahia Residence 2 or Bahia 2 is part of the Bahia Residence Complex. The building has 8 floors and 48 apartments divided into 16 one-bedroom units and 32 two-bedroom units. All apartments have balconies overlooking the beautiful community. It features a rooftop swimming pool, spa, and well-equipped gym. 


Bahia Residence 2, also known as Bahia Building 2, features 24-hour security and CCTV camera surveillance. The apartments have large windows that are filled with natural light. For safety reasons, all units are fitted with smoke detectors. 


Tamani Properties\' mission is to provide our clients with the latest knowledge and quality service. Whether you are a property owner, renter, or buyer, you are number one. We value your business and will give you the care and service you deserve. 


To view the apartment and more details, call [redacted phone number]
